message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you have.  I'm asking for $13,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high to me. Could you do $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,000?
